DOC.brief_title: Outcomes Lower Extremity Soft Tissue Sarcoma Patients After Limb Salvage
DOC.detailed_description: The first purpose study validate Finnish version Musculoskeletal Tumor Society scale Toronto Extremity Salvage Score upper extremity section . The second purpose chart functional capability health-related quality life ( HRQoL ) upper extremity sarcoma patient undergone limb salvage surgery local free flap . Patient hospital record retrospectively review chart demographic clinical data . The recruitment patient take place outpatient clinic Department Oncology , Helsinki University Hospital . The study include cross-sectional assessment one year follow-up five validated questionnaire . A follow-up conduct three year surgery outpatient clinic .
DOC.criteria: Lower extremity soft tissue sarcoma locate hip/gluteus foot No metastasis time diagnosis Undergone limb salvage surgery A minimum 1 year followup Written consent Age > 18 Age < 18 No limbsalvage surgery due sarcoma
